name: Strongpoint Marketing
description:
Strongpoint Marketing is a marketing strategy firm with a specific focus on communications consulting, PR and market research.
We help our clients put their strategies to work and tell their stories to the audiences they want to reach through Strategic communications planning, building effective relationships with the news media, message development and communications coaching, public outreach and community relations, and crisis communication.
Tell your story. Make your point. And make it strong.
